pkgmetadata.longdescription: # cheesyutilsA number of miscelanious utilities, mostly for writing bots in discord.py## UsageYou can install the package by running the following command:```shpip install -U cheesyutils```You can import the installed package by running the following python code```pyfrom cheesyutils.discord_bots import DiscordBot```Creating a simple Discord bot with only the builtin Meta commands:```pyfrom cheesyutils.discord_bots import DiscordBotbot = DiscordBot( prefix=".", color="#a0365c")bot.run("YOUR TOKEN HERE")```
